job_details.degree_required: BS/BA in computer science, information technology, or related field

jd: From: abhisek, source infotech inc abhisek.k@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: abhisek.k@sourceinfotech.com Position: Sr .NET Developer (.NET / Angular / MVC)Duration: 12-months contractMode: Must work onsite in Los Angeles, CAVisa: No H1B and CPTLinkedIn needed Note:Three references will be required to submit to the client, and copy of the degree.Job DescriptionCandidates will have at least 10 years working in Information Technology which will include the following:1) The proposed candidate must have 5 years of experience building complex .NET web applications, API services, functions, workflow, and SQL queries with T-SQL and PL/SQL stored procedures.2) Experience in the following area(s) is required:a. 5 years of ASP.NET/MVCb. 5 years of C# Programmingc. 5 years of REST/SOAP API and web services designd. 3 years of modern/mobile responsive front-end development using JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3e. 5 years of Angularf. 3 years of Entity Framework and SQL Server 2012 or higher databaseg. 5 years of .NET Core3) Proposed candidate must have a BS/BA degree in computer science, information technology, or related field. Additional qualifying experience may be substituted for the required degree on a year-for-year basis.
